title: One Piece: Nami's Clima-Tact, Explained
author: GameRant Editorial
description: An in-depth article explaining how Nami's Clima-Tact weapon works, from its debut in episode 117 through its various evolutions including the Perfect Clima-Tact, Sorcery Clima-Tact, and current Zeus-enhanced version.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers about Clima-Tact evolution through Wano arc

title: The Evolution of Nami's Clima-Tact, Explained
author: GameRant Editorial
description: Detailed breakdown of how Nami's signature weapon has evolved throughout the series, starting from its party-trick origins in episode 117.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses all versions of the Clima-Tact through current episodes

title: Dissecting Anime Science: How the Clima-Tact Works - Part 1
author: Kvasir369
description: Scientific analysis of how Nami's Clima-Tact could theoretically work in real life, examining the meteorological principles behind her weather manipulation techniques.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Focuses on original Clima-Tact from Arabasta arc

title: One Piece Eps 115-117
author: One Piece with a Lime
description: Discussion of One Piece episodes 115-117, covering Nami's battle with Miss Doublefinger and the Clima-Tact debut.

title: ONE PIECE EP 117 'Nami's Whirlwind Warning! Clima-Tact Explosion' Full Length Reaction
author: mikeyventure
description: Full-length reaction video to One Piece episode 117, featuring Nami's first use of the Clima-Tact weapon.

title: 117: 'Nami's Cyclone Advisory! Clima Tact Burst!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: Blog post reviewing episode 117 from the perspective of a first-time watcher, discussing Nami's struggle with the Clima-Tact and how it's basically useless to anyone but her.

title: One Piece: 17 Times Nami Proved She Isn't Weak
author: GameRant Editorial
description: Article highlighting Nami's strongest moments in the series, including her battle with Miss Doublefinger in the Arabasta arc which showcased her first solo victory.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for multiple arcs throughout the series
